name: Tetris - The Puzzler King
description:
From now on, let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game! Once you start, you'll be hooked.

Keep your lines clear and keep your cool as things heat up in this puzzle game that’s easy to pick up, but difficult to master.

- Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
- Global leaderboard
- Exquisite Game Interface!
- Play games for FREE
- Classic block puzzler game
